home.presentation: Hi, I'm Thibault Morizet, a developer who loves building cool things with code.

about.second: I have a passion for web design and back-end development, so am always looking for ways to incorporate it into my life.
about.third: When I'm not at my desk I am probably lifting weights, boxing, or reading :)
